he Locathah language was the language spoken by the locathah, a race of fish-like humanoids.
Beyond locathah themselves, Locathah was a common secondary language among koalinths, merfolk, sea elves of the Inner Sea and Outer Sea, vodyanoi
Some of the individual specialty priests of aquatic deities were known to learn various other aquatic languages, such as Locathah. These included the sea druids of Deep Sashelas, the waveservants of Umberlee, and the waterwalkers of Istishia. It was also a common secondary language among jungle druids, specialty priests in the Church of Ubtao, who sought to learn the exotic languages of the creatures that lived around the Chultan Peninsula.
